feed.title: pwrshell[dot]net
feed.subtitle: A place to store all my findings, as I may not the only one looking for stuff around Kubernetes, Azure & PowerShell.

entry.title: Welcome !
entry.content:
Here is the new home of PwrShell.net for now. After a long time without blogging and sharing my findings, starting from scratch with a nice hosting sound like a good idea.

As usual, youâ€™ll find writtings about kubernetes, Azure or PowerShell (not in that particular order :) ) you may also read posts about sports (trail or running)

See you soon, space cowboy !

Bye.
entry.summary: Here is the new home of PwrShell.net for now. After a long time without blogging and sharing my findings, starting from scratch with a nice hosting sound like a good idea.
